title.value: Общая и тяговая динамика подрессоренного гусеничного трактора с задненавешенным орудием. Кинематика
General and tractive dynamics of spring-mounted caterpillar tractor with back-mounting implement. Kinematics
General and tractive dynamics of spring-mounted caterpillar tractor with back-mounting implement. Kinematics

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Gorin, G.S., Belarusian National Technical University, Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The design scheme of implement of the machine-tractor aggregate based upon spring-mounted caterpillar tractor is proposed in the article. In the calculation of small mutual movements of the tractor and implement the location of the four centers of the tractor – gravity, pressure of running gear, resistance of suspension mount and rotation of pull-rod of implement attaching unit - should be considered; movement of agricultural implement's supporting wheel on broken terrain is analyzed. The equation of constraint of the mutual connection of small longitudinal angular movements of the tractor and mounted agricultural implements is obtained. The following conclusions are made: interrelation between spring-mounted caterpillar tractor and implement attaching unit is researched taking into account mutual movements of both devices; when adjusting the horizonal position of the implement frame in working position, the trim in the static structure of the tractor should be considered.
